price: Pero quienes no creen en la vida del más allá, se desvían de ese camino.
arabic: وَإِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ عَنِ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ لَنَٰكِبُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna alladhīna lā yu'minūna bil-ākhirati ʿani al-ṣirāṭi lanākibūna
